column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Suyin says : " I did n't realize it at the time , but that moment put a rift between us .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " We 're doing what you do n't have the guts to do : We 're going to Ba Sing Se to help bring order back to the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Suyin says : " No !
#Text=You will stay here !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " And who 's going to stop me ?
#Text=Your security force was more than happy to join my cause .
#Text=They 're some of the best fighters in the world , and they are tired of being treated like exotic birds in your cage .
#Text=" Suyin says : " If you leave now , you will never be welcomed back .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " When I choose to return , it 'll be on my own terms .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Kuvira and Baatar left that day with Varrick , my security force , and a few of Zaofu 's wealthiest citizens .
#Text=After Kuvira proved herself by stabilizing Ba Sing Se , Raiko and the other world leaders made her the provisional head of the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=When she refused to step down , I knew it was only a matter of time before she made her way back here .
#Text=" Korra says : " I want to fix this .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You can .
#Text=Go into the Avatar State and demolish her entire army .
#Text=Remove Kuvira from power once and for all .
#Text=" Korra says : " Fighting is something the old me would do .
#Text=That always made things worse .
#Text=Let me talk with Kuvira .
#Text=Maybe I can reason with her .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Kuvira does n't listen to reason .
#Text="
